head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DICOSTANZO, JOHN JOSEPH

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DICOSTANZO, JOHN JOSEPH

block.p: DiCOSTANZO-John Joseph. On September 12, 2000. Beloved husband of Jerane. Devoted father of Justine and Jana. Beloved grandfather of Francis William. Mass of Christian Burial on Saturday, Holy Name Church, 96 St. and Amsterdam Ave., 11 AM. Interment Calvary Cemetery. Friends may call at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave. at 81 St. Thursday, 7-9 and Friday, 2-4 and 7-9.
